Comment.Language: The response to the Catholic Epistle is chanted. The response to the Catholic Epistle hymn is chanted before the reading of the Catholic Epistle:

Text.Language: A petj/k e~bol n~je pic~mou tou logou Pefiwt i~af[icarx hwc rwmi n~telioc.
Perfect is the blessing, of the Word of the Father, who came and was incarnate as a perfect man.
الكامل بركة أبيه الكلمة أتى وتجسد كانسان كامل.
A petqelqwlf nau e~rof. A petqelqwlf sop nemwten. A petqelqwlf asf hijen pic~tauroc.
The slaughtered One was seen. The slaughtered One is present among you. The slaughtered One is crucified on the Cross.
المذبوح نظروه المذبوح كائن معكم. المذبوح معلق علي الصليب.
Yai te ]no/~te. Yai te ]ceb/roc. }p~rockunic/c tw monw <rictoc.
This is eloquent. This is miraculous. Worship is due to the only-begotten Christ.
هذه العقلية، هذه الأعجوبة. السجود للمسيح الواحد.
Ere pic~mou n~]t~riac eyouab. (2) Viwt nem Ps/ri nem Pip~neuma eyouab.
The blessings of the Holy Trinity (2): the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit.
بركة الثالوث الأقدس، الآب والابن والروح القدس.
Ere pic~mou n~]yeo~tokoc (2) Maria y~mau n~I/couc Pi,~rictoc.
The blessings of the Theotokos (2): Mary the Mother of Jesus Christ.
بركة والدة الإله مريم أم يسوع المسيح.
Ere pic~mou m~penpatriar,/c: (2) n~iwt ettai/out n~ar,ie~reuc papa abba (nim).
The blessings of our Patriarch (2): the honorable father, the archpriest Pope Abba (…).
بركة بطريركنا الأب المكرم رئيس الكهنة البابا أنبا (...)

Comment.Language: In the presence of a metropolitan or a bishop:

Text.Language: Ere pic~mou m~pene~pickopoc (m~penm/tropolit/c) (2) n~iwt ettai/out abba (nim).
The blessing of our Bishop (Metropolitan) (2), the honorable father Abba (…).
بركة أسقفنا (مطراننا) الأب المكرم أنبا (...)
Eue~i~ e~h~r/i e~jen pailaoc t/rf: je a~m/n ece~swpi.
Shall come upon this entire congregation. Amen. So be it.
تكون مع جميع الشعب أمين.
Kayolikon: kayolikon.
The Catholic Epistle…
الكاثوليكون.
